description: The BoyzParty.com archives are like a museum of deliciouness and this week they uncovered this audition tape for 18 year old Cj Washington, a slender 'cute as a button' young model from central Ohio. CJ stands 5'9' tall, weighs a light 116 lbs. and has blonde hair and brown/hazel eyes, and a very respectable 8' dick. We were particularly intrigued by his piercings, which tastefully done can make a guy look really hot. 'It's cool that you guys didn't have a problem with that', he told us. 'Some studios want you practically perfect, with nothing at all added, but I like how you feel about them adding character. I have tongue, nipple, dermal implants on collar bones, lips, prince albert, reverse eyebrow and ears pierced!'. And we do think it gives him the proper 'bad boy' personality which matches his sexuality. 'Yeah, thanks! I'm an aggressive everything!', he admits. 'I go all-out whether I'm a top or a bottom or whatever. I love sex. I love dick. I love cum. I'm a natural for this, I think'. Look for a lot more from this young man and a huge load of jizz at the end!
title: Citiboyz 60: 'Boner Buddies', Scene #07
